parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: (primarily physical), I look, see, perceive, discern. A primary verb; to look at.
A primary particle; down, in varied relations (genitive, dative or accusative) with which it is joined).
From pros and ops; the front, i.e. The countenance, aspect, appearance, surface; by implication, presence, person.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A primary verb; to convince; by analogy, to pacify or conciliate; reflexively or passively, to assent, to rely.

parse: Reflexive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular

str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Anointed One; the Messiah, the Christ. From chrio; Anointed One, i.e. The Messiah, an epithet of Jesus.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To reckon, count, charge with; reason, decide, conclude; think, suppose.

parse: Reflexive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular

str2: Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative 1st Person Plural
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
Thus, so, in this manner. Or (referring to what precedes or follows).
According to the manner in which, in the degree that, just as, as. From kata and hos; just as, that.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Nominative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Anointed One; the Messiah, the Christ. From chrio; Anointed One, i.e. The Messiah, an epithet of Jesus.
